internal.content: --- title: "Setup ServiceNow" date: 2022-11-03T10:57:46+01:00 weight: 192 --- The purpose of this guide is to provide a self-contained set of instructions to integrate with ServiceNow, summarizing instructions from IBM Documentation and other sources. ServiceNow integrations provide historical and live data for change requests, incidents, and problems. ServiceNow integrations also provide inventory data for the ServiceNow observer. **Important** You can only have one ServiceNow integration per instance. The instructions have been successfully tested against a ROKS cluster on the IBM Cloud.
